name: Comic Company Manager
description:
Run a comic publishing company

Have you ever wanted to run a comic publishing company and create your own comic books? Or just like management games? Then this is the game for you!
Hire people and expand your offices as you launch more and more comics or crash and burn your company with terrible comics no one buys.

The aim of Comic Company Manager is to be a deep management game that will provide many hours of content for fans of the genre. It is early access so many features will be added and current ones may be completely overhauled.

Current Features

  • Hire writers, artists, inkers and colorists
  • Manage teams to find people who work best together
  • Create comic series in multiple genres and adjust they settings to what you think will sell
  • Complex market system that determines what comics will sell well
  • Expand your company by renting extra offices
  • Make and customize player character
